badger_status_block.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over a domain name with a red slider in the list of domains in the popup or under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

options_remove_origin_confirm.message: Tem certeza de que deseja remover esse domínio do Privacy Badger?
options_remove_origin_confirm.description: Confirmation shown when you click to remove a domain from Privacy Badger's tracking domains list on the options page.

badger_status_noaction.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over a non-tracking domain name with a green slider in the list of domains in the popup or under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

non_tracker_tip.message: Atualmente, o Privacy Badger apenas verifica se terceiros estão a usar cookies, armazenamento local em HTML5, ou canvas fingerprinting para rastrear a sua navegação. Alguns desses domínios podem estar a usar métodos de rastreamento que o Privacy Badger não consegue detetar.

options_dnt_policy_setting.message: Verificar se os domínios de terceiros estão em conformidade com a política de Não Rastrear da EFF
options_dnt_policy_setting.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

donate_to_eff.description: Button shown in the popup and on the intro page.

intro_donate_subheading.message: Ajude-nos com um donativo e partilhando o seu apoio às nossas ferramentas
intro_donate_subheading.description: Shown below the Donate button on the intro page.

intro_not_an_adblocker.message: Não sou um bloqueador de anúncios, sou diferente

report_success.message: Obrigado! Nós iremos verificar o problema.

dnt_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over a DNT-compliant domain name in the list of domains in the popup or under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

breakage_warning_tooltip.message: Bloqueando este domínio é conhecido por quebrar os sítios da Internet
breakage_warning_tooltip.description: Tooltip for a warning icon that appears when move a domain slider to 'red' (block) for a domain that was automatically set to 'yellow' (block cookies).

feed_the_badger_title.message: Clicar para devolver o controlo deste domínio ao Privacy Badger
feed_the_badger_title.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over an undo arrow that appears when you move a domain slider away from its automatic setting.

next_section.description: Image alt. text on a couple of "scroll down" arrow buttons on the intro page.

extension_error_text.message: Por favor, reporte-nos o seguinte erro:
extension_error_text.description: Shown in the popup when there is a problem with the user's Privacy Badger extension that we want to encourage the user to tell us about.

data_settings.description: This is an options page tab heading.

domain_slider_cookieblock_tooltip.message: Clique aqui para impedir que este domínio use cookies
domain_slider_cookieblock_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the center part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

options_domain_filter_block.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_webrtc_setting.message: Impedir que o WebRTC mostre o endereço de IP local
options_webrtc_setting.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

intro_welcome.message: O Privacy Badger aprende automaticamente a bloquear rastreadores invisíveis. Tire um minuto para saber como.

options_domain_list_tab.description: This is an options page tab heading.

share_button_title_twitter.description: Text that comes up when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

first_run_text.message: Saiba como o Privacy Badger protege a sua privacidade
first_run_text.description: Part of a reminder to visit the intro page. Shown in popup until the user clicks on the reminder link or browses through the intro page.

options_widget_replacement_desc.message: Ao bloquear botões sociais e outros widgets possivelmente úteis (para vídeo, áudio, comentários, etc.), o Privacy Badger pode substituí-los por marcadores de lugar que clicam para ativar.
options_widget_replacement_desc.description: Introduction to the Widget Replacement tab on the options page

options_social_widgets_checkbox.description: Checkbox label on the Widget Replacement tab

options_widget_exceptions_header.description: Header text on the Widget Replacement tab

options_hide_social_widgets.description: Label for a form on the Widget Replacement tab

options_widget_site_exceptions_header.description: Header text on the Widget Replacement tab

options_widget_site_exceptions_label.message: Always allow widgets on these sites:
options_widget_site_exceptions_label.description: Label for a form on the Widget Replacement tab

options_show_nontracking_domains_checkbo.message: Mostrar domínios que não parecem estar a rastreá-lo
options_show_nontracking_domains_checkbo.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page. Should match wording used in the 'non_tracker' message.

badger_status_allow.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over a tracking but still allowed (green slider) domain name in the list of domains in the popup or under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

privacy_badger_what_is.message: O que é o Privacy Badger?

options_domain_search.description: Label for a text input box on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

options_learn_setting.message: Learn to block new trackers from your browsing
options_learn_setting.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

local_learning_warning.message: Enabling learning may make you more identifiable to websites
local_learning_warning.description: Tooltip on the general settings page

options_incognito_setting.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

options_incognito_warning.message: Ativar o aprendizado em janelas Privadas/Anónimas/Incógnito pode deixar rastros do seu histórico de navegação privada no seu computador. Por padrão, o Privacy Badger irá bloquear rastreadores já conhecidos em janelas Privadas/Anónimas/Incógnito, mas não aprenderá sobre novos rastreadores. Pode querer ativar esta opção caso utilize muito o modo de navegação em janelas Privadas/Anónimas/Incógnito.
options_incognito_warning.description: Tooltip on the general settings page

learning_prompt_text1.message: Privacy Badger will no longer learn from your browsing by default.
learning_prompt_text1.description: First part of a prompt to visit the blog.

learning_prompt_text2.description: Second part of a prompt to visit the blog.

learning_prompt_button.message: Learn how Privacy Badger is changing
learning_prompt_button.description: Button text, part of a prompt to visit the blog.

show_counter_checkbox.description: Checkbox label on the general settings page

what_is_a_tracker.description: Tooltip that comes up when you hover over the 'tracking domains' link under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

intro_report_button.message: Por favor não esqueça de clicar em "O Privacy Badger estragou este site? Diga-nos!" se quiser ajudar-nos. Nós respeitamos a sua privacidade por isso os relatórios de problemas não são enviados automaticamente.
intro_report_button.description: Intro page paragraph. The quoted message ('Did Privacy Badger break this site') should match the first part of the translation for the 'report_broken_site' message.

report_terms.message: This will automatically send the following information to EFF: the page you're currently visiting, your browser version, the version of Privacy Badger, and the state of all of the sliders on this page.

popup_enable_for_site.message: Ativar o Privacy Badger para este site

options_domain_type_filter.description: Label for a dropdown control on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

import_successful.message: Lista de rastreadores e configurações atualizadas com sucesso!

manage_data_intro.message:
Importar dados do utilizador:
  • Substitui as configurações gerais
  • Combina as listas de sites desativados
  • Combina informações sobre os rastreadores que o Privacy Badger detetou
  • Substitui personalizações do controlo deslizante
manage_data_intro.description: A brief explanation of what happens when you import Badger user data. Shown above the import/export user data buttons under the Manage Data options page tab.

reset.description: Options page button, under the Manage Data tab

reset_data_confirm.message:
Limpar os domínios de rastreamento irá:

  • Eliminar todos os dados sobre rastreadores que o Privacy Badger aprendeu com sua navegação
  • Restaurar a lista de domínios de rastreamento para a última lista pré-criada (visite www.eff.org/badger-pretraining para saber mais)
reset_data_confirm.description: Pop-up triggered when the reset_data button is clicked

remove_all.description: Options page button, under the Manage Data tab

remove_all_data.message: Remover todos os domínios de rastreamento

remove_all_data_confirm.message:
Remover todos os domínios de rastreamento irá:

  • Eliminar tudo que o Privacy Badger sabe sobre os rastreadores
  • Fazer com que o Privacy Badger não bloqueie nada até que tenha a hipótese de reaprender a partir da sua navegação
remove_all_data_confirm.description: Pop-up triggered when the remove_all_data button is clicked

intro_text1.message: Agora está protegido pelo Privacy Badger.
intro_text1.description: First part of a reminder to visit the intro page. Shown in popup until the user clicks on the reminder link or browses through the intro page.

intro_text2.message: Para saber como o Privacy Badger funciona, clique abaixo para um tutorial rápido.
intro_text2.description: Second part of a reminder to visit the intro page

options_webrtc_warning.message: O WebRTC pode revelar o seu endereço de IP local. Tenha em mente que se ativar esta opção pode reduzir o desempenho em aplicações de conferência Web como o Google Hangouts.
options_webrtc_warning.description: Tooltip on the general settings page

options_general_settings.description: This is an options page tab heading.

options_privacy_settings.description: Subheading on the general settings options page.

options_advanced_settings.description: Subheading on the general settings options page.

domain_slider_block_tooltip.message: Clique aqui para bloquear totalmente este domínio
domain_slider_block_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the leftmost part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

version.description: Shows Privacy Badger's version in the popup. For example, "version 2018.8.1".

badger_status_cookieblock.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over a domain name with a yellow slider in the list of domains in the popup or under the Tracking Domains tab on the options page.

options_domain_filter_cookieblock.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

show_tracking_domains_acknowledgement.message: Compreendo, mesmo assim quero ver a lista de domínios de rastreamento.
show_tracking_domains_acknowledgement.description: Acknowledgement shown next to the checkbox required to reveal the tracking domains list on the options page.

firstRun_title.message: Obrigado por instalar o Privacy Badger!

import_select_file.message: Por favor, selecione um ficheiro para importar.

report_broken_site.message: O Privacy Badger estragou este site? Diga-nos!

tooltip_cookieblock.message: Centralize o controlo deslizante para bloquear cookies

intro_learns_paragraph.message: Instead of keeping lists of what to block, Privacy Badger automatically discovers trackers based on their behavior.

intro_beyond_ads_paragraph.message: Invisible tracking happens in all sorts of ways; ads are just the visible tip of the iceberg. Privacy Badger sends the Global Privacy Control signal, to opt you out of data sharing and selling, and the Do Not Track signal to tell companies not to track you. If they ignore your wishes, Privacy Badger will learn to block them—whether they are advertisers or trackers of other kinds.

options_domain_filter_dnt.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

popup_help_button.description: Tooltip that comes up when you hover over the question mark button in the upper right corner of the popup.

options_domain_filter_allow.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

intro_donate_heading.message: A privacidade é um desporto de equipa!
intro_donate_heading.description: Part of the 'donate' section on the intro page.

show_tracking_domains_message.message: Não deve precisar de alterar nada aqui.
show_tracking_domains_message.description: Shown above the acknowledgement checkbox required to reveal the tracking domains list on the options page. This is the second paragraph; the first paragraph is the message under the "intro_not_an_adblocker_paragraph" key.

options_domain_filter_all.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

tooltip_block.message: Mova o controlo deslizante para a esquerda para bloquear um domínio

options_enable_dnt_checkbox.message: Send websites the "Global Privacy Control" and "Do Not Track" signals
options_enable_dnt_checkbox.description: Checkbox label for enabling/disabling the Sec-GPC and DNT signals, found on the general settings page

options_disable_google_nav_error_service.message: Disable sending web addresses you visit to Google. This disables suggestions for similar pages when a page can't be found.
options_disable_google_nav_error_service.description: Checkbox label found on the general settings page

options_disable_hyperlink_auditing.description: Checkbox label found on the general settings page

options_disable_network_prediction.description: Checkbox label found on the general settings page

options_domain_filter_user.description: Dropdown control setting on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

popup_instructions.description: Popup message shown when at least one tracker was blocked.

popup_instructions_no_trackers.description: Text shown in the popup when there are no trackers on the page.

popup_blocked.message: There are no third party resources on this page. Hooray for privacy!
popup_blocked.description: Text shown in the popup when showing non-tracking domains is enabled, and there are no third-party domains on the page.

intro_by_eff.message: Um projeto da Electronic Frontier Foundation

tooltip_allow.message: Mova o controlo deslizante para a direita para permitir um domínio

popup_disable_for_site.message: Desativar o Privacy Badger para este site

domain_slider_allow_tooltip.message: Clique aqui para permitir este domínio
domain_slider_allow_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown when you hover over the rightmost part of a slider shown for each domain in the domain list.

intro_privacy_note.message: O Privacy Badger NUNCA partilhará dados sobre a sua navegação, a não ser que escolha partilhá-los.

options_domain_list_trackers.message: Privacy Badger has decided to block $COUNT$ potential $TRACKER_LINK_START$tracking domains$TRACKER_LINK_END$ so far
options_domain_list_trackers.description: Shown on the Tracking Domains tab on the options page after Privacy Badger learned to block one or more domains

options_domain_list_no_trackers.message: O Privacy Badger ainda não detetou nenhum domínio de rastreamento. Continue a navegar.
options_domain_list_no_trackers.description: Shown on the Tracking Domains tab on the options page if all tracking domains have been removed.

intro_not_an_adblocker_paragraph.message: O Privacy Badger começa a bloquear após detetar o mesmo rastreador em três sites diferentes. Três golpes e está fora!

options_domain_status_filter.description: Label for a dropdown control on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

intro_donate1.message: Quando usa o Privacy Badger, está a junta-se à Electronic Frontier Foundation e a outros milhões de utilizadores na luta pela privacidade. Somos uma organização sem fins lucrativos que luta pelos seus direitos na Internet. Obrigado por se juntar a nós.
intro_donate1.description: Part of the 'donate' section on the intro page.

options_domain_search_tooltip.message: Para excluir domínios, preceda o seu termo de busca com "-". Por exemplo, ".co -.com" mostrará domínios .co e .co.uk, mas não domínios .com.
options_domain_search_tooltip.description: Tooltip for an "information" icon next to the domain search input on the Tracking Domains options page tab.

intro_disable_button.message: Se acha que o Privacy Badger está a estragar uma página (por exemplo, não consegue ver um vídeo), pode clicar no botão "Desativar" para desativar o Privacy Badger para esse site.
intro_disable_button.description: Intro page paragraph. The quoted string ('Disable') should match the verb used for the 'popup_disable_for_site' message.

intro_link_policy.description: Shown at the bottom of the intro page, links to the EFF software and technology projects privacy policy.

not_yet_blocked_header.message: O seu Badger ainda não decidiu se estes domínios devem ser bloqueados
not_yet_blocked_header.description: Popup domain list header text; separates blocked from haven't-yet-seen-enough-to-block potential trackers.

options_show_not_yet_blocked.message: Mostrar domínios que o seu Badger ainda não se decidiu bloquear:
options_show_not_yet_blocked.description: Label for a checkbox on the Tracking Domains options page tab. Should match wording used in the 'not_yet_blocked_header' message.

non_tracker.message: Os domínios abaixo não parecem estar a rastreá-lo
non_tracker.description: Header text; separates tracking from non-tracking domains in the popup.

share_button_title_facebook.description: Text that comes up when you hover over the social sharing buttons on the intro page.

description.message: O Privacy Badger aprende automaticamente a bloquear rastreadores invisíveis.

social_tooltip_pb_has_replaced.message: O Privacy Badger substituiu este botão $BUTTON$
social_tooltip_pb_has_replaced.description: Tooltip shown over a replaced social button. For example, "Privacy Badger has replaced this Facebook Like button". See also the widget_placeholder_pb_has_replaced message.

widget_placeholder_pb_has_replaced.description: Text shown inside a replaced widget's placeholder. For example, "Privacy Badger has replaced this Google reCAPTCHA widget". See also the social_tooltip_pb_has_replaced message.

allow_once.description: Button in the placeholder shown in place of certain third-party (video, audio, commenting) widgets. Clicking it will allow the third-party widget to load this one time only.

allow_on_site.description: Button in the placeholder shown in place of certain third-party (video, audio, commenting) widgets. Clicking this button will always allow the widget to load on this particular site.

sync_intro.message:
Sincronização na nuvem:
  • Requer o Firefox/Chrome Sync
  • O envio substitui quaisquer dados existentes do Privacy Badger na nuvem
  • O descarregamento combina as listas de sites onde o Privacy Badger está desativado
sync_intro.description: A brief explanation of how syncing works. Shown above the upload/download cloud data buttons under the Manage Data options page tab.

upload.description: Button label for uploading data to the cloud on Manage Data options page tab.

upload_cloud.message: Exportar sites desativados para a nuvem
upload_cloud.description: Button title for uploading data to the cloud on Manage Data options page tab.

download_cloud.description: Button title for downloading data from the cloud on Manage Data options page tab.

download_cloud_success.message: Os dados na nuvem foram importados com sucesso.
download_cloud_success.description: Message displayed to the user after successfully merging cloud data.

download_cloud_failure.message: Não foi possível descarregar os dados na nuvem.
download_cloud_failure.description: Message displayed to the user after failing to download cloud data.

upload_cloud_success.message: Os dados foram enviados com sucesso para a nuvem
upload_cloud_success.description: Message displayed to the user after successfully uploading local data.

upload_cloud_failure.message: Não foi possível enviar os dados para a nuvem
upload_cloud_failure.description: Message displayed to the user after failing to upload local data.

download_cloud_no_data.message: Não há dados na nuvem para descarregar.
download_cloud_no_data.description: 'Error' message when there is on cloud data to download.

popup_share_button.description: Tooltip that comes up when you hover over the share button in the upper right corner of the popup.

share_tracker_header.message: Privacy Badger blocked $COUNT$ potential trackers on $DOMAIN$:
share_tracker_header.description: Header above the list of tracking domains in the share message.

share_base_message.message: O Privacy Badger (privacybadger.org) é uma extensão de navegador que aprende automaticamente a bloquear rastreadores invisíveis. O Privacy Badger é feito pela Electronic Frontier Foundation, uma organização sem fins lucrativos que luta pelos seus direitos na Internet.
share_base_message.description: The base message that is always included in the share message.

copy_button_initial.description: Initial text of the copy button on the share overlay.

copy_button_copied.description: On-click text of the copy button on the share overlay.

popup_special_page_paragraph.message: O Privacy Badger não funciona em páginas especiais como esta. Tente navegar noutro lugar.
popup_special_page_paragraph.description: Shown in the popup for special browser pages such as the New Tab page and 'about:' pages.

popup_disabled_site_header.message: O Privacy Badger está desactivado neste site
popup_disabled_site_header.description: Shown in the popup on disabled sites.

disabled_for_these_domains.message:
Privacy Badger is disabled on the following sites. This means that Privacy Badger will not block anything when you visit the sites listed here, and it will not send the Do Not Track or Global Privacy Control signals.

If you think Privacy Badger is breaking a page, or you would like to allow a particular site to share or sell your data, you can type that page's domain in the box below and click the "Add domain" button.

Alternatively, when you already have the page's tab selected, you can just click on Privacy Badger's button in the browser toolbar and then click the "Disable" button.
disabled_for_these_domains.description: 'Add domain' should match the 'add_domain_button' message. 'Disable' should match the start of the 'popup_disable_for_site' message.

allowlist_domain_input_placeholder.description: Placeholder for a text input under the Disabled Sites tab on the options page

add_domain_button.description: Button found under the Disabled Sites tab on the options page

remove_button.description: Button found under the Disabled Sites tab on the options page

invalid_domain.message: Por favor, adicione um URL ou um domínio válido
invalid_domain.description: Error shown when attempting to add an invalid domain to the list of disabled sites
